mapper.sql: (SELECT SUM(attenVacateManage.duration) FROM attenVacateManage WHERE attenVacateManage.userId = #{userId} AND attenVacateManage.idVacate = ${id} AND attenVacateManage.year = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y') ) AS durationTotal, IFNULL((SELECT attenVacateRule.duration FROM attenVacateRule WHERE attenVacateRule.idAttenVacate = a.id AND attenVacateRule.tagScope = 'p' AND attenVacateRule.userId = #{userId} LIMIT 1),(SELECT attenVacateRule.duration FROM attenVacateRule WHERE attenVacateRule.idAttenVacate = a.id AND attenVacateRule.tagScope = 'a' LIMIT 1) ) AS durationRule,
LEFT JOIN attenVacateRule AS b ON b.idAttenVacate = a.id
CONCAT(a.`name`,' - ',(CASE WHEN a.unit = 'w' THEN '工作日' WHEN a.unit = 'c' THEN '日历日' END)) AS nameDetail,
